message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.

I understand you think it's pricey, but I've done some research and this product is really worth more than you're offering. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth it!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise at $155. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $130 for it.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to meet you at $145, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $145, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $135 for it.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $150, as that's the minimum price I'm willing to accept. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you at $150. But if not, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options
I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $125 for it, but that's my final offer.
